I = input
for _ in [0] * int(I()):
    ((c, a), (d, b)) = sorted(zip('01', map(int, I().split())), key=lambda x: x[1] % 2)
    s = [*I()]
    f = s.count
    i = 0
    for x in s:
        i -= 1
        if '1' < s[i]:
            s[i] = x
    j = f('?')
    i = b - f(d)
    k = -1
    while j > 0:
        k = s.index('?', k + 1)
        s[k] = s[~k] = (d, c)[j > i]
        j -= 2
    print((''.join(s), -1)[(f(d), s) != (b, s[::-1])])

I = input
for _ in [0] * int(I()):
    ((c, a), (d, b)) = sorted(zip('01', map(int, I().split())), key=lambda x: x[1] % 2)
    s = [*I()]
    f = s.count
    i = 0
    for x in s:
        i -= 1
        if '1' < s[i]:
            s[i] = x
    j = f('?')
    i = b - f(d)
    k = -1
    while j > 0:
        k = s.index('?', k + 1)
        s[k] = s[~k] = (d, c)[j > i]
        j -= 2
    print((''.join(s), -1)[(f(c), f(d), s) != (a, b, s[::-1])])
